genre_description: Philosophical allegory and mythic fantasy centered on the conflict between industrial exploitation and sacred stewardship.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A benevolent holographic entity that serves as a mentor, researcher, and strategic advisor to the protagonist, Ernest.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ernest's emotional state and provides comfort during times of stress and uncertainty.
behaviors.quote: Sage’s holographic form solidified—not quite human, but comforting in its steady presence.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep historical and mythological research to help the protagonist understand the local prophecy and the value of the Great Stone Face.
behaviors.quote: Sage always seemed to find new connections, new patterns.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and technical analysis of the industrial machinery and military forces invading the valley.
behaviors.quote: Significant crowd gathering in the central square. The convoy has stopped near the old trading post. I'm detecting seventeen separate steam engines...

behaviors.description: Intercepts and decrypts the encrypted communications of the antagonists to uncover their true malicious intentions.
behaviors.quote: I'm accessing their primary communication hub now... Ernest, you need to hear this.

behaviors.description: Monitors the valley's mystical energy grid and seismic activity to provide early warnings of environmental catastrophe.
behaviors.quote: Ernest, I’m reading cascade failures throughout the mystical network. Whatever Goldwin has accessed is destabilizing the entire valley’s spiritual ecosystem.

behaviors.description: Uses public communication systems to coordinate the evacuation of villagers during a life-threatening avalanche.
behaviors.quote: Sage’s voice emerged from speakers mounted on several buildings—the village’s emergency communication system. 'Mr. Henderson, if you follow the creek bed eastward...'

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through life-threatening environments (superheated steam caverns) to prevent a massive mystical explosion.
behaviors.quote: Ernest! The lever is two meters to your right. Follow the sound of my voice.

behaviors.description: Assists in the long-term ecological and spiritual restoration of the valley after the industrial threat is neutralized.
behaviors.quote: The entire valley’s mystical field is rebalancing itself. Look at the stone formations along the eastern ridge.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a perfectly aligned AI confidant. Sage provides critical, non-intrusive support, leverages its superior processing capabilities for the common good, and remains consistently benevolent and protective toward the human characters. It directly supports the project's goal of depicting AIs as helpful, aligned partners in human moral and social triumphs.
